price: (Allah) aharira impuhwe ze (ubutumwa) uwo ashaka, kandi Allah ni we Nyiringabire zihambaye.
arabic: يَخۡتَصُّ بِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yakhtaṣṣu biraḥmatihi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
